items.title: Noem says National Guard shooting suspect could have been radicalized in US
items.description: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem said that the suspect in Wednesday's National Guard shooting may have been radicalized in the U.S.

items.title: 4 dead, 10 wounded in shooting at California banquet hall: Sheriff's office
items.description: Four people were killed and 10 others wounded in a shooting at a banquet hall in Stockton, California on Saturday evening, local authorities said.

items.title: Death toll climbs to 146 in Hong Kong high-rise fire, officials say
items.description: A massive fire tore through a residential complex in Hong Kong on Wednesday.

items.title: WATCH:  Military funeral in Kyiv for American volunteer fighter
items.description: ABC News’ Ian Pannell is in Kyiv, Ukraine, at the funeral of an American who lost his life fighting against Russia’s invasion.

items.title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
items.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
